name: CliKintoneTest-1 Should return the error message when specifying unknown option
fullName: features/common.feature#CliKintoneTest-1 Should return the error message when specifying unknown option

steps.name: When I run the command with args "record export --app 1 --base-url http://example.com --foo"
Then I should get the exit code is non-zero
And The output error message should match with the pattern: "Unknown argument: foo"

labels.name: suite
labels.value: CliKintoneTest-1 Should return the error message when specifying unknown option

items.statusDetails:
AssertionError [ERR_ASSERTION]: The input did not match the regular expression /Unknown argument: foobar/. Input:
